TopicTitle: Tantares parachutes wouldnt work when RealChutes is installed?

Articles.Content: Hi, i have installed RealChute then Tantares, but when i tried the Return chute for Vostok, the cute wouldnt brake when fully deployed. Is it a techncally problem, disturbed by RealChute or somethig wrong With Physics.cfg?
At what speed you oppened the parachute? I use both mods and parachutes work fine for me. Try using the parachute when your speed ia lower than 320m/s. Also, try redownloading both mods

It deployed 5000m over the ground, and the speed is 242m/s. The capsule hit the ground in 241m/s. I think it might not be the parachute is braking the ship, but the aerodynamics, i tested it on all the tantares parachutes, but none of them worked. Then i tried the Stock chutes or Realchute chutes, it worked perfectly.

So... i have busted that might not be somethig wrong with Physics.cfg!
